title: Moms Are Gonna Mom
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn are back in chambers to clear the docket. They talk about gifts for in-laws, red baseball caps, group photos, puzzles, and ghosts. Plus a listener letter about Korean Fan Death!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
